survey of formula manipulationthe field of formula manipulation is surveyed,with particular attention to the specific capabilities of differentiation integration and the supporting capabilitiesof simplification displays and input/output editing and precision arithmetic general systems-bothbatch and online-are described finally some programs to solve specific applications are discussed.cacm
